summary: The Chief Data and AI Officer (CDAIO) & Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Program at Bar-Ilan University is a comprehensive and integrated training program designed for professionals aiming to excel in data, analytics, AI, and digital management. The program combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills, focusing on the roles of CDAIO and CDO, which are pivotal in driving business value, innovation, and operational efficiency in organizations. Participants will gain expertise in data strategy, cloud technologies, data governance, AI, digital marketing, and project management. The program includes 240 academic hours, with additional workshops and final projects, culminating in prestigious certifications: CDAIO, CDO, Advanced Project Management, and Data Science & GenAI. The curriculum is delivered by leading industry experts and academics, offering a unique opportunity to enhance professional skills and career prospects in the rapidly evolving fields of data and digital transformation.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Chief Data and AI Officer (CDAIO) & Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Program

COURSE OVERVIEW: This unique and comprehensive program at Bar-Ilan University is designed for professionals aiming to advance their careers in data, analytics, artificial intelligence (AI), and digital management. The program combines the fields of Chief Data and AI Officer (CDAIO) and Chief Digital Officer (CDO), which have become critical for driving business value, operational innovation, and technological advancements. Participants will gain in-depth knowledge, management skills, and professional expertise to excel in these high-demand roles.

TARGET AUDIENCE: The program is targeted at:
- CIOs, CTOs, and IT managers seeking to expand their expertise.
- Software development department managers.
- Information systems auditors.
- BI and Data Science managers aspiring for senior management roles.
- Experienced IT project managers or data product managers.
- Organizational digital leaders aiming to broaden their knowledge.
- Digital marketing managers.
- Experienced digital product managers (business or technical).
- Digital development managers.

COURSE LEADERSHIP:
- Academic Director: Mr. Eran Shaham, Head of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, with extensive experience in IT and cybersecurity training.
- Academic Leaders for CDAIO: Mr. Lior Israeli and Mr. Ido Biger, both with significant expertise in data, analytics, and AI.
- Academic Leader for CDO: Mr. Or Shalit, a seasoned digital management professional.
- Academic Advisors and Lecturers: Mr. Itai Hazan, Mr. Oren Mizrahi, Mr. Meni Dalal, Ms. Einat Shimoni, Attorney Efrat Greenbaum, and others, all with extensive industry experience.

PREREQUISITES:
- Significant experience in managing data projects, information systems, or digital activities.
- Academic degree and/or relevant certifications.
- Passing an interview with the program director or academic advisor.

CERTIFICATIONS: Chief Data & Analytics Officer (CDAIO), Chief Digital Officer (CDO), Advanced Project Management (APM), Data Science & GenAI, effective personal development workshops.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: April 11, 2024.
- Duration: Approximately six months.
- Academic Hours: 240 hours of frontal learning + 60 hours for final projects.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30â€“21:30.
- Additional enrichment or makeup classes may be scheduled.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Location: Classes held at the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber, Bar-Ilan University, Ramat Gan, and via Zoom.
- Facilities: Advanced multimedia systems for interactive participation.
- Recordings: All classes are recorded and available for review.
- Physical attendance is highly recommended, especially for presentations and project work.
- Adjustments may be made based on university or national guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES:
- Registration Fee: 480 NIS.
- Tuition: 14,500 NIS.

COURSE TOPICS:
1. Chief Data AI & Analytics Officer Program (130 Academic Hours):
   - Module 1: The Emerging Role of the CDAIO (5 AH): Overview of roles and interfaces, Data & Insights Driven Organization.
   - Module 2: Data Strategy (5 AH): Building, managing, and measuring data strategies.
   - Module 3: Cloud Journey (10 AH): Cloud strategies, migration, economics, and security.
   - Module 4: Data Platform & Architecture (15 AH): Modern data warehousing, big data technologies, hybrid transformations, and data services.
   - Module 5: Data Privacy & Regulations (10 AH): GDPR, CCPA, organizational privacy strategies, and compliance.
   - Module 6: Organization Data Governance (5 AH): Governance models, strategies, and deployment.
   - Module 7: Data Management Governance Technologies (5 AH): Data catalog, lineage, quality management, and consumption.
   - Module 8: Data Science (10 AH): AI/ML concepts, supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and model optimization.
   - Module 9: Data Science Operation Management (5 AH): Managing data science initiatives, embedding with business processes, and ML-OPS.
   - Module 10: Generative AI Data Science (10 AH): Real-world use cases, large language models, and AI tools.
   - Module 11: Data Analyst, Visualization & Storytelling (10 AH): BI creation, dashboards, and UX design.
   - Module 12: Data Monetization (5 AH): Monetization methods, data as a financial asset, and industry use cases.
   - Module 13: Advanced Project Management (20 AH): Agile project management, Scrum, and Kanban.
   - Module 14: Executive Project Management (5 AH): PMI, project initiation, and leadership styles.
   - Module 15: Data & AI Literacy (5 AH): Establishing data culture and AI literacy.
   - Module 16: Final CDAIO Project (5 AH): Mentoring and project presentation.

2. Chief Digital Officer Program (100 Academic Hours):
   - Module 1: Digital Strategy for Organizations (5 AH): Creating digital strategies aligned with organizational needs.
   - Module 2: Digital Platforms (15 AH): Web platforms, CMS, mobile apps, and e-commerce solutions.
   - Module 3: Gen AI for Digital Needs (5 AH): Generative AI tools and applications.
   - Module 4: Digital Marketing (20 AH): Advertising systems, SEO, and content creation.
   - Module 5: Digital Analysis (15 AH): Google Analytics, dashboards, and app analysis.
   - Module 6: Digital Product & Stakeholder Management (10 AH): KPI definition, prioritization, and collaboration.
   - Module 7: The Digital Experience (15 AH): UX, UI, CX, and micro-copy.
   - Module 8: CRO (10 AH): AB testing, personalization systems, and heat maps.
   - Module 9: CDO Final Project (5 AH): Project presentation and course summary.

3. Personal Skills Development (10 Academic Hours):
   - Career management, LinkedIn profile optimization, and presentation skills.
